entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is introduced as the one who grasped the lid of the packing case and pulled out a dementor. He is described as trying to keep his mind on flying but something else keeps intruding.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one who yelled 'Expecto patronum!' and is being threatened by a dementor. He is described as trying to keep his mind on flying but something else keeps intruding.

entities.name: dementor
entities.description: A dementor is introduced as the creature that rose from the box and started to sweep silently toward Harry. It is described as having a hooded face, glistening scabbed hand, and drawing a deep, rattling breath.

entities.name: mother
entities.description: Harry's mother is mentioned as someone he might hear again if he thinks about her. She is not physically present in the scene but has an emotional impact on Harry.

relationships.description: Harry is being threatened by a dementor, which is described as sweeping silently toward him and drawing a deep, rattling breath.
